products.title: Day & Night Effortless Cream
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Burst Campfire Smoke Roller Blind
products.description: The slightly darker grey colour of the burst campfire smoke is ideal for anyone looking for a stylish and modern, darker grey colour in their window. Pair this in with whites and soft greys in the rest of your home to create a relaxing environment to enjoy and relax within. These blinds are a dimout material so will gently filter the light making them ideal for living rooms, kitchens and bathrooms.

products.title: Burst Pearl Roller Blind
products.description: Warm and creamy, the burst pearl is the perfect blind if you are needing a lightly coloured blind but white is too sharp for your tastes. Working well with earthier natural colours like browns and greens for a warm ambience or blues, whites and random netting on the wall for a nautical theme. An absolute classic, the pearl will always be the best of beige. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric.

products.title: Palate Cream Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Ivory Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The ivory coloured aluminium venetian blind is a beautifully, creamy-white coloured slat. Ideal for anyone not wanting a pure white slat in their window, but want something that is warmer and more delicate. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

This is the perfect blind for people who don't want the bright white of some blinds, but like the crisp effect, white gives a room. Additionally, the amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. products.description: The gibson egg shell is a light, bright fabric. Use this to help lighten a room and help to make it feel bigger. The light colour will pair with any decor and this blind is suitable for any room in the home - especially bathrooms. The 100% pvc fabric is fully waterproof, meaning that it can be installed right next to a shower without worry about damaging the fabric. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. products.title: Veil Cream Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The veil cream voile blind has a destinctive stripe running down the fabric which is a plain smooth finish. This is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Pura Ivory Voile Roller Blind
products.description: Thepura ivory voile is a soft cream colour with a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in.

products.title: Mayfair Cream Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: The mayfair cream dimout perfect fit offers unbridled elegance in an easy-fit form. Rather than installing onto the wall, the blind clips to your actual window frame, for a flush fit that integrates seamlessly into your window. When closed the pleated style means the honeycomb fabric cascades down the glass, as well as offering thermal benefits to help regulate temperature. A milky cream tone creates a delicate neutral, which would pair well with more traditional interiors and antique furnishings.

products.title: Mayfair Ivory Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Experience premium shading in its simplest possible form with the mayfair ivory dimout perfect fit. This blind clips onto your actual window frame, the brackets sliding in to lock onto your window without need of drilling or tools. The pleated style creates an attractive texture in your window frame, rippling down the glass when closed, and additionally provides thermal benefits to help regulate temperature.

products.title: Eggshell Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium slats are their most hard wearing style, ideal for humid or high-traffic spaces. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required no drills necessary with their revolutionary clip-on perfect fit blinds in eggshell.

products.title: Pearl Honeycomb Blackout Perfect Fit
products.description: Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The blackout pleated fabric will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required all of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms.

products.title: Oyster White Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: With its shimmering pearlescent hue, oyster white has a subtle gloss finish that's utterly charming in sunlit spaces. Made from hard wearing and moisture-resistant aluminium, it's ideal for busy or humid spaces such as conservatories, and its direct-to-pane fitting is ideal for 'tricky' windows and patio doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Delicate Cream Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Grey is the new white in the world of interiors, and this hampton dove is a particularly on-trend shade. Instead of a block colour, the polyester blind is made up of short strokes of lighter and darker greys, for a lively and organic effect. These horizontal strokes marry well with the pleated ripples that run throughout the fabric, the concertina effect creating its own natural highlights and pooling shadows.

products.title: Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Create elegant shading in your window with the kingston cream pleated perfect fit. The game-changing blind style fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall above, for a simple tools-free installation system. Colour match your perfect fit frame to your upvc window for an integrated, cohesive look. The cream hue has a classic elegance that's well suited to traditional interiors.
